comment.author: 21734563@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Veterans of the American Civil War, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 14646043@N02
comment._content: This may be misidentified. They mostly look like enlisted men and they appear to have artillery insignia on their caps.

comment.author: 66406516@N08
comment._content: The crossed cannon insignia on the forage caps and the dark (red) chevrons indicate that this is definitely an Artillery unit.
